roleset.name: remove thyself
roleset.note: EXTRICATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'extricate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from extricate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: cosmic justice
example.text: A spot honoring Bill White, the inventor of chewing gum, shows [a woman]-1 trying [*-1]to extricate her high-heeled shoe from a wad of gum.
